name: Hektic
overview: A shooter created by Mark Jones for Magic Disk 64 1992/02, and Magic Disk 64 GE 1993/1, and also inAbo Disk #4. It was also published as Alfer in Italy by Tutto C64 n.2 (1992/1993). "LOAT or LANCE, that's the question" - whoever chooses the former has it easier, whoever chooses the latter has a harder time.
